title: Henry V
creator_credit: BBC, Cedric Messina and David Giles
brief_description: Shortly after his coronation, Henry V decided to press his claims to the French throne and leads an army into France. He defeats a vastly larger French army at Agincourt (1415), wins the hand of the French Princess Catherine of Valois, and is recognised as the heir to the French throne.
